title.narrative: Education for all Fast Track Initiative in Laos

description.narrative: This initiative provides support to the Education for All (EFA) / Fast Track Initiative (FTI) program in Laos. The EFA/FTI program in Laos is also co-financed by World Bank Additional Fund and FTI Catalytic Fund. The program is the biggest education intervention in the history of Lao PDR. The funds will be invested in pre-primary and primary education, with a focus on the most educationally disadvantaged children in Laos. The major component of the program involves a basic education intervention to be delivered in partnership with the World Bank and the Ministry of Education. Australia's contribution to the funds will help build and renovate schools, provide comprehensive in-service training to teachers, provide teaching and learning materials and provide non-formal education to villages without a school via provision of a 'mobile' teacher. The total value of this initiative is $22.9 million over 4 years, starting 2010-11.
